body:
Lol I first met this author from her yaoi works, so when I saw that anime I was like "oh, please you know what we all want 😏 
Some hardocore gay shit!!!!!"

Looks like the art for Kiss Him Not Me. 
Is this the same author, or someone with a similar/same art style? If it is the original author, wow, I didn't know she/he drew actual yaoi too.
